      • getcombatants

        public final java.util.List<Combatant> getcombatants()
        Overrides:
        getcombatants in class Academy
        Returns:
        Any combatants that are situated in this actor, may return null if this is not a valid request for this type of actor. For performance if a List is returned it should be the canonical one, and thus should not be directly modified by the receiver.
        See Also:
        Combatant.newid()

      • generategarrison

        protected final void generategarrison​(int minlevel,
                                      int maxlevel)
        Description copied from class: Fortification
        The default implementation generates a Location.garrison according to the location. Called during construction and responsible for setting Fortification.targetel.
        Overrides:
        generategarrison in class Fortification
        Parameters:
        minlevel - See Fortification.minlevel.
        maxlevel - See Fortification.maxlevel
